subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ actions after Derek Stepan was blindsided by the Capitals’ Troy Brouwer on Wednesday show how far N.H.L. teams have come in terms of concussion awareness.
snippet: The Rangers’ actions after Derek Stepan was blindsided by the Capitals’ Troy Brouwer on Wednesday show how far N.H.L. teams have come in terms of concussion awareness.
